description:
Head tracking software for MS Windows, Linux, and Apple OSX

Application dedicated to tracking user's head movements and relaying the information to games and flight simulation software.
### Features

- tracker/neuralnet: add new model (@DaWelter).
- tracker/neuralnet: add new resolutions and framerates (@DaWelter, @sthalik).
- tracker/neuralnet: add back 0.2 models.
- Add a very thorough and complete Chinese translation (@renzhefeilong did the amazing work here).
- Add gamepad shortcut input for XInput devices such as gamepads. You need to install the GameInput
  redistributable (@sthalik).
- Add camera offset implementation used for camera trackers when the camera is mounted off-center
  such as to the side (@DaWelter, @sthalik).
- Switch to Qt 6 (@sthalik).

### Bug fixes

- The PS3 Eye camera input was broken in the 2024 build but it should work now (@sthalik).
- tracker/pt: the dialog now fits vertically on-screen in the 1280x768 resolution.
